metadata.title: CVE-2024-35329 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: libyaml 0.2.5 is vulnerable to a heap-based Buffer Overflow inyaml_document_add_sequence in api.c.

criterions.comment: libyaml package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-12').
libyaml-libyaml-perl package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-12').
golang-yaml.v2 package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-12').
